text: Jimmy Lloyd (1918-1988) was an American actor who played Tex in the 1947 film serial The Sea Hound. I Talked with a Zombie: Interviews with 23 Veterans of Horror and ... 0786452684 Tom Weaver - 2009 " ... Jimmy Lloyd— you don't know him, probably—was a good-looking young guy who must have done at least a dozen B-pictures." ==Partial filmography== *Blondie (1938) *When Johnny Comes Marching Home (1942) - Sailor (uncredited) *She's a Sweetheart (1944) - Pete Ryan *Together Again (1944) - Master of Ceremonies (uncredited) *Let's Go Steady (1945) - Henry McCoy *Ten Cents a Dance (1945) - Billy Sparks *The Story of G.I.
